what are the subject i can take?
responses: We offer various courses in the science, commerce, and arts streams.

patterns: Who is the Hod of Bengali Department?

patterns: How many professors are there in bengali department?
Who are the other professors of bengali department?
responses: There are a total 9 professors in the Bengali department. For more information, visit our department profile.
The Bengali department has nine professors in total. See our department profile for further details.

patterns: How much is the fee for doing bengali honours?
What is the semester fee for BA honours in Bengali?
responses: For a 3-year course of BA in Bengali, it will cost 1779 rupees per semester, and for a 4-year course, it will cost 1887 rupees per semester.
